attributes.action: increase the amount of motorcycle parking in London and to increase the parking charges for one year in order to pay for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are incessantly banging on about motorcycle thefts around London but are not in favour of paying for more secure parking. With increased secure parking the amount of thefts will decrease and insurance premiums will decrease so in the long term it is the only real way to save motorcyclists money and ensure a secure parking ability.
